mapper.select: SELECT o.*, p.name AS product_name, p.attach_name, m_seller.name AS seller_name, m_buyer.name AS buyer_name FROM TB_ORDER o JOIN TB_PRODUCT p ON o.product_id = p.product_id JOIN TB_MEMBER m_seller ON o.seller_id = m_seller.member_id JOIN TB_MEMBER m_buyer ON o.member_id = m_buyer.member_id;
